document_data.name: Desha
document_data.mainbody:
'''Desha of the Shadows''' was an [[elf|elven]] [[hunter]] operating out of [[Port Nyanzaru]] in [[Chult]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|Watch your step, the shadows are filled with sharp teeth!|Desha of the Shadows}}
document_data.Activities:
Desha's favored prey were jungle [[beast]]s, particularly [[smilodon]]s although he also sought to cull a population of [[undead]] [[sun bear]]s within the jungle.

He traded bait and lures to hunters who impressed him.
document_data.Relationships:
Desha was a member of the [[Hunters' Guild of Chult]], who congregated at [[Hunter's Square]] in Port Nyanzaru.

When [[Volothamp Geddarm]] visited the city in the late 15{{th}} century DR, he became acquainted with Desha of the Shadows.
document_data.History: During the time of the [[death curse]],{{ToA-time}} Desha was interested in helping other hunters to pursue a number of famous beasts, such as the [[giant spider]] [[Arachne (spider)|Arachne]], a massive [[ape]] known as [[Gigantopithecus]], and the great white [[cat]] known as [[Baccho]]. He also sought to hunt down [[Polaris (bear)|Polaris]], a [[giant bear|giant]] [[polar bear]] who had served as a [[mount]] for a [[frost giant]] in the jungle.
